hebrew: בָּרוּךְ אַתָּה יְיָ אֱלֹהֵינוּ מֶלֶךְ הָעוֹלָם אֲשֶׁר יָצַר אֶת הָאָדָם בְּחָכְמָה וּבָרָא בוֹ נְקָבִים נְקָבִים חֲלוּלִים חֲלוּלִים. גָּלוּי וְיָדוּעַ לִפְנֵי כִסֵּא כְבוֹדֶךָ שֶׁאִם יִפָּתֵחַ אֶחָד מֵהֶם אוֹ יִסָּתֵם אֶחָד מֵהֶם אִי אֶפְשַׁר לְהִתְקַיֵּם וְלַעֲמוֹד לְפָנֶיךָ. בָּרוּךְ אַתָּה יְיָ רוֹפֵא כָל בָּשָׂר וּמַפְלִיא לַעֲשׂוֹת.
english: Blessed You are ETERNAL our God King of the universe Who formed the man with wisdom and created in him many openings and many hollows. It is revealed and known before the Throne of Your Glory that if were to be opened one of them or were to be sealed one of them it would be impossible to survive and to stand before You. Blessed You are ETERNAL Who heals all flesh and performs wonders.
transliteration: Baruch atah Ad-nai Eloheinu melekh ha'olam asher yatzar et ha'adam b'chokhmah u'vara vo n'kavim n'kavim chalulim chalulim. Galui v'yadua lifnei khisei kh'vodekha she'im yipate'ach echad mehem o yisatem echad mehem ee efshar l'hitkayem v'la'amod l'fanekha. Baruch atah Ad-nai rofeh khol basar u'mafli la'asot.
